title: 7 Urgent Lessons from the CrowdStrike Disaster
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: What can IT organizations learn from the software update that brought the world to its knees this week? Spoiler: a lot of things they should already know.
cntitle: CrowdStrike 灾难中的 7 个紧急教训
cndescription: 本周的软件更新让全世界陷入瘫痪，IT 机构能从中吸取什么教训？剧透：很多他们应该已经知道的知识。
